hotels.title: Five-Star Heritage Mansion Retreat on Cape Town's Atlantic Seaboard with Spa, Restaurant & Rooftop Bar
hotels.description: Journey to this boutique Cape Town escape at Ellerman House, a beacon of sophistication perched on the slopes of Lion's Head. This historic mansion, now a world-class hotel, offers breathtaking views of the Atlantic Ocean from every elegant corner. Explore the vibrant Victoria & Albert Waterfront, dine at the city's top restaurants, or visit the nearby Table Mountain. Back at the hotel, savour the finest South African wines in the cellar, with over 9,000 labels to browse. Admire the country's most extensive private art collection, unwind in the sumptuous spa, dine on flavourful South African cuisine and catch a sensational sunset with a cocktail in hand - all from the comfort of this exquisite cliffside retreat.

hotels.title: Elegant Cape Town Oasis in V&A Waterfront with Outdoor Pool & Wellness Spa
hotels.description: Experience the magic of Cape Town with a stay at this five-star retreat, perfectly positioned in the city's vibrant V&A Waterfront district. Here, you'll find yourself surrounded by the city's finest dining, shopping and entertainment venues, all set against the backdrop of the majestic Table Mountain and glittering Atlantic Ocean. After a day of exploring, return to this luxurious haven and savour a tipple at the speakeasy-inspired Bascule Bar, enjoy a refreshing dip in the outdoor pool or indulge in a pampering treatment at Fairmont Spa. Don't miss the opportunity to explore the nearby Zeitz Museum of Contemporary Art Africa, or take a scenic drive along the stunning Chapman's Peak Drive.

hotels.title: Five-Star One&Only Cape Town Waterfront Resort with Table Mountain Views
hotels.description: Experience a stay to remember at the five-star One&Only Cape Town Resort - perfectly positioned alongside the fashionable Victoria & Alfred Waterfront and framed by the spectacular Table Mountain. This vibrant resort offers everything you need, including world-class Japanese-Peruvian fare at Africaâ€™s first Nobu restaurant, an impressive infinity-edge pool, a dedicated KidsOnly programme, plus a sprawling island spa in the middle of the resort. Admire the legendary Table Mountain from this haven, then explore further afield with restorative yoga classes and tours with an expert mountain guide (surcharges apply) or dive into the sparkling beaches of Cape Town, with shimmering azure waters and sensational sunset views.
